last_phrase: In conclusion, the key to the technique of Hermetic Fire and alchemical "cuerere" lies in understanding the one substance of two natures. One is precious, the other is vile. One dominates, the other kills. But both are necessary to achieve the quintessence and the Water of Life. Only by acknowledging and working with both can one attain the hidden truth of nature, as spoken by Pitagora and the master alchemists before us.
